about_the_game:
Brawler Bro’s is an arcade kickboxing beat em up title which is taking inspiration from the famous “Fight Night™” series made by EA. As a player you’ll encounter challenging fights against Ai or human opponents based on simple to learn but hard to master fighting mechanics. Tactics and resource management are important aspects as each fighters stats are dynamically adapting to the situation of the fight which lead to variable encounters that feel challenging but always leave room for a comeback story of the underdog.



Brawler Bro’s is currently developed by just two people going by the name “PHOS digital”. The proof of concept demo was developed in just two months during 2021 using the popular Unity 3D engine.

Since it will be a while till we can release the full game, we have setup an early demo build for you to try out. The demo is a very early version and not the full game yet. Be assured to encounter bugs, glitches and faulty balancing. Progression is not really implemented yet and the available content is limit. The game is using flickstick controls - therefore playing with a controller is mandatory at the moment.

The current demo is meant to be viewed as a technical proof of concept version and does not reflect the full quality or content quantity of the final product.
